title: Sukiyaki
lyrics:
[intro]
(C)  (Am)  (G)  (F-G7)
 
(C) Ue o (Am)mu-uite (C) aru(Am)ko-ou
(C) Namida (Am)ga kobo(F)re nai (G)yo-ou ni
(C) Omoida(G)su (Em7)haru no (Am)hi
(F)Hitori(G)bo-otchi no (C)yo(Am)ru (G-G7)
 
(C) Ue o (Am)mu-uite (C) aru(Am)ko-ou
(C)Niji-in(Am)da hoshi (F)o kazo(G)e-e-ete
(C) Omoida(G)su (Em7)natsu no (Am)hi
(F)Hitori(G)bo-otchi no (C)yoru
 
[chorus]
(F)Shiawase (F)wa kumo (C)no ue (C)ni
(F)Shiawase (Fm)wa sora (Am)no ue (G)ni
 
(C) Ue o (Am)mu-uite (C) aru(Am)ko-ou
(C) Namida (Am)ga kobo(F)re nai (G)yo-ou ni
(C) Nakinaga(G)ra (Em7)aru-u(Am)ku
(F)Hitori(G)bo-otchi no (C)yo(Am)ru (G-G7)
 
[whistling] (C)  (Am)  (C)  (Am)
[whistling] (C)  (Am)  (F)  (G)
(C) Omoida(G)su (Em7)natsu no (Am)hi
(F)Hitori(G)bo-otchi no (C)yoru
 
[chorus]
(F)Kanashimi (F)wa hoshi (C)no kage (C)ni
(F)Kanashimi (Fm)wa tsuki (Am)no kage (G)ni
 
(C) Ue o (Am)mu-uite (C) aru(Am)ko-ou
(C) Namida (Am)ga kobo(F)re nai (G)yo-ou ni
(C)Nakinaga(G)ra (Em7)aru-u(Am)ku
(F)Hitori(G)bo-otchi no (C)yo(Am)ru (G-G7)
(F)Hitori(G)bo-otchi no (C)yo(Am)ru (G-G7)
(C-single strum) [end]
